DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare pharmacokinetics profile safety Evogliptin patient wit hepatic dysfunction versus healthy volunteer single oral dose Evogliptin
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Safety Evogliptin Subjects With Hepatic Dysfunction
DOC.detailed_description: When future evogliptin administer liver dysfunction patient , investgate whether dose adjustment necessary .
